resources.string: Note \n\nSigning Out will clear all your Records i.e. Class and Student Names and Attendances too. So, Please proceed with catution!

string.name: about_us_article
string.p: Welcome to our Attendance App! We are Pratik Kumar Rathore and Sudhir Pradhan, final year BCA students, and this app is our major project.

\n\nOur app provides a convenient solution for managing attendance records. With our user-friendly interface, you can easily create manual classes and enroll students by their names. The app also generates date-wise attendance sheets in PDF format for easy tracking and record-keeping.
\n\nOne of the highlights of our app is the dark mode feature, which allows you to switch to a visually pleasing dark theme that reduces eye strain and conserves battery life.
\n\nRest assured, we have implemented secure login functionality to protect your data and ensure privacy. Your attendance records and personal information are safe with us.
If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us.
